tool.name: Chado biomaterial get
tool.command:
@START_PSQL@ &&
chakin expression get_biomaterials
#if $provider_id: --provider_id '$provider_id' #end if #if $biomaterial_id: --biomaterial_id '$biomaterial_id' #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id '$organism_id' #end if #if $biomaterial_name: --biomaterial_name '$biomaterial_name' #end if #if $analysis_id: --analysis_id '$analysis_id' #end if
| jq -S . > '$results'
&& @STOP_PSQL@

param.name: provider_id
param.label: Provider Id
param.help: Limit query to the selected provider

param.name: biomaterial_id
param.label: Biomaterial Id
param.help: Limit query to the selected biomaterial id

param.name: biomaterial_name
param.label: Biomaterial Name
param.help: Limit query to the selected biomaterial name
